description: This file defines a Flutter widget called GamesScreen, which presents a grid layout of game cards, allowing users to browse and launch games within the app. The widget uses other custom widgets like TopBar and NavDrawer, and constructs the UI with Flutter's Scaffold, GridView, and various styling elements.

classes.name: GamesScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a grid of game items, allowing the user to browse available games with a responsive UI layout.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Returns the widget tree for the GamesScreen, constructing the UI using Flutter widgets like Scaffold, GridView, and custom widgets TopBar and NavDrawer.
